page.title: 05NEW TOWN INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: {DEANS}INDUSTRIAL ESTATE IS ONE OF THE FIVE ESTATES IN{LIVINGSTON.}WHEN LIVINGSTON WAS PLANNED THEY GAVE FIRMS INCENTIVES TO COME AND SET UP THEIR FACTORIES IN LIVINGSTON.A SLOGAN{MAKE IT IN LIVINGSTON}WAS INTRO DUCED.THERE ARE LOTS FACTORIES AND COMPANIES IN THE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE. MOST OF THEM ARE MAIN FACTORIES THE LARGEST FACTORY IN THE INDUSTRIAL IS THE {NIPON ELECTRIC COMPANY.}COMPUTERS PLAY A LARGE PART IN THE RUNNING OF MOST OF THE INDUSTRIES.THE FIRMS IN THE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE CAN BE CLASSIFIED AS THE FOLLOWING; LIGHT ENGINEERING, MANUFACTURING AND TRAINING SERVICES .
